Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is worth more than $120 to me, but I believe in making it accessible to those who appreciate its unique features. For you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a special rate. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
